Question.Subject: When will Lockerz get prizes in stock?
Question.Content: Im in Australia and im wondering when lockerz will get prizes in stock?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
The exact time and date of this redemption will not be revealed! another surprise redemption !
For march redemption I suggest you to use LockerzAlerts service - http://www.lockerzalerts.com , they will send you text message to your mobile phone when redemption occurs so you wont miss it ! as you may now every second counts because prizes are going out of stock really fast !
